com.esri.svr.ejb
Interface LayoutService

All Superinterfaces:
javax.ejb.EJBObject, Remote
public interface LayoutService
extends javax.ejb.EJBObject

This interface defines functionality of a layout service.

getLayoutImage

public String getLayoutImage(String serviceName,
                             int width,
                             int height,
                             String extent,
                             boolean[] layerVisList,
                             int selectedLayerIndex,
                             String findString,
                             String mapTitle)
                      throws RemoteException
get response from server with given set of parameters

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
width - the image width
height - the image height
extent - the map extent
layerVisList - the visibility list of each individual layers
selectedLayerIndex - the selected/active layer
findString - the find string
mapTitle - the title text
RemoteException

getLayoutImage

public String getLayoutImage(String serviceName,
                             int width,
                             int height,
                             String extent,
                             boolean[] layerVisibility,
                             int selectedLayerIndex,
                             String queryEnvelope,
                             String queryString,
                             double bufferDistance,
                             String bufferUnit,
                             int targetLayer,
                             String mapTitle)
                      throws RemoteException
get response from server with given set of parameters

Parameters:
serviceName - the service name
width - the image width
height - the image height
extent - the map extent
layerVisibility - the visibility list of each individual layers
selectedLayerIndex - the selected/active layer
queryEnvelope - the spatial query filter
queryString - the query where clause
bufferDistance - buffer distance
bufferUnit - the buffer unit
targetLayer - the target layer for the buffer
mapTitle - layout title
Returns:
RemoteException
